contents.text: Thank you for calling Evernote Peninsula, where we help you capture and prioritize ideas, projects, and to-do lists.
If you need help capturing notes or using our productivity tools, press 1.
For troubleshooting app issues or reporting bugs, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Fix app syncing errors so I can access my latest notes
I’m getting an error when syncing notes on my mobile app and need technical help.
I need help troubleshooting an OAuth authentication error in the Evernote Windows client.
I can’t sync my notes on my tablet and need help fixing the app.
I need help resolving a sync error that’s preventing my lab notes in Evernote from updating across my devices.

contents.text: For account settings and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Update my subscription payment details to avoid service interruption
I want to update my payment method and review my account billing details.
I need to update my credit card information for my Evernote Premium subscription.
I’d like to update my payment method and review my recent bill.
I’d like to update my credit card for my student Evernote subscription and review my recent billing statement.

contents.text: For information on premium plans and sales, press 2.
To speak with our sales team about new subscriptions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to sales.

navigationGoals: Upgrade to a Premium plan and get pricing details quickly
I’m looking to switch to a premium plan, ideally at a veteran discount.
I’d like to discuss enterprise licensing options for a 50-user Evernote deployment.
I want to sign up for the Evernote Premium plan.
I want to speak with someone about purchasing a new Evernote Premium plan with student pricing.

contents.text: For partnership opportunities and developer API inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: Inquire about developer API integration for our team
I’d like to discuss a potential partnership to integrate your API for our unit’s workflow.
I want to inquire about developer API access to integrate Evernote with our CRM system.
I’m trying to connect Evernote with another app using your developer API.
I’m exploring how to use the Evernote API to integrate my physics research notes with our lab’s data analysis tools.
